content: That's really interesting. I never thought about the themes in Death Note that deeply before. My cousin and I actually had a similar discussion about our personal struggles and how we perceive justice and morality. We exchanged over 200 messages discussing everything from our favorite TV shows to our personal struggles. It was really nice to connect with someone on that level. Anyway, back to Death Note, do you think the show portrays Light Yagami as a villain or an anti-hero?
